title: [GAMEPLAY] Fiddle dance animation stops
body:
The first couple of times I tried dancing as fiddle I thought my entire game had frozen, but props like snails on the ground and the such would still move.
He spins once, and on his second turn, his animation instantly freezes until he leaves that spot. The bug is pretty self-explanatory. I'm not 100% certain, but I think he can't do any other one of his animations after he's been frozen.

replies.body:
that's actually on purpose
he freezes after a few seconds of not moving
it's part of his passive, . . .being a scarecrow and all

they have to make the wait longer though, no one can see any of his animations properly as is
Its not a bug, its his passive where after a few moments of standing still, he literally freezes then gets a movement speed bonus.
As others have mentioned here, this is working as intended. :)

Would it be possible to give the passive its own pose (maybe the classical scarecrow one, or would it be easily mistaken for him charging his ult?) and to give his animations a better interaction with his passive?
Maybe even just make his emotes and dance count as movement, if him not freezing in place during his passive wouldn't be acceptable... we'd have to delay getting the passive if we want to use an emote, but at least we would once again be able to see them like we can for any other champion.
